price: 31. Markay u laabtaanna ehelkooda waxay laaban jireen iyagoo ku maaweeleysanaya,
arabic: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُواْ فَكِهِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā inqalabū ilā ahlihimu inqalabū fakihīna
